solution_line_template: When Tate bought {bought_tickets} more tickets, the total number of tickets he has increased to {initial_tate_tickets}+{bought_tickets} = <<{initial_tate_tickets}+{bought_tickets}={tate_total_tickets}>>{tate_total_tickets} tickets.
Peyton has half as many tickets, meaning he has {half_fraction}*{tate_total_tickets} = {peyton_tickets} tickets.
